com.tractionsoftware.gwt.user.client.ui

Class AutoSizingTextArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
        • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
          • com.tractionsoftware.gwt.user.client.ui.AutoSizingBase<TextAreaWithSelection,TextArea>
            • com.tractionsoftware.gwt.user.client.ui.AutoSizingTextArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyDownHandler, KeyUpHandler, HasAttachHandlers, ResizeHandler, ValueChangeHandler<java.lang.String>, EventHandler, HasHandlers, EventListener, Focusable, HasText, HasVisibility, IsRenderable, IsWidget

    public class AutoSizingTextArea
extends AutoSizingBase<TextAreaWithSelection,TextArea>
implements ResizeHandler
    This attaches to an input, listening for KeyDown/KeyUp, and automatically resizing the text area. It does this using an invisible textarea that matches the text of the input.

      • onLoad

        protected void onLoad()
        Description copied from class: AutoSizingBase
        Matches the styles and adjusts the size. This needs to be called after the input is added to the DOM, so we do it in onLoad.
        Overrides:
